E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/16/1990
Subject: Progress of Tom Marsh
Dear Sir,
Tom Marsh is hitting the ball well at AA London Tigers!
He has an AVG of .281, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/22/1990
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I no
regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Vic Rodriguez



Date: Sunday, 7/20/1990

Diagnosis: Infected Lymph Node.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 5 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

learning his new position, First Base.
